text: An excellent meal, the butter chicken (murgh makhani) was delicious. We also tried the jeera rice (basmati rice cooked with cumin and coriander) and the allepey fish curry (cooked with green mango and coconut milk gravy) for the first time. Interesting in a good way! The dishes were full of flavour, we mopped up all the curry gravy with a garlic naan and the rice, and washed everything down with sweet lassi as well. Service staff was very attentive and courteous as well, even though the restaurant was full. We enjoyed our dinner very much!

Good place for coastal Indian food esp from Kerala. We had main course curries like Mango Mapas which were full of flavours and not very spicy. Excellent place for vegetarians with lots of options! The quantity was good too and appam was great. The service was good and the staff were helpful.

We ordered butter chicken curry and vegetables ishtu. First time tried vegetable ishtu. It was very delicious. Must order it if you like coconut gravy taste!!!
We definitely come back again!

The Mango Tree is a fantastic spot for authentic Indian cuisine! The appam was soft, fluffy, and perfectly made, while the fish dishes were absolutely delicious with the right balance of spices. The flavors were fresh and authentic, recommended! Use your HSBC entertainer app for 1-1 deals.
Really nice restaurant with amazing food and ambiance . All the staff were super attentive and nice. Will definitely be coming back!
